desc.line1: A minimal, open-source interface for file scanning and threat detection that makes the Antivirus itself look professional and work exactly like ClamAV (A FOSS CLI Antivirus).
desc.line2: Built with Tauri, React, and modern desktop and web tools. This software is provided as-is. No data is collected or transmitted. This GUI uses ClamAV's clamscan and freshclam engines. Scan types are presets that define which locations and which limits are used.
desc.line3: ClamAV is a trademark of Cisco Systems, Inc. This project is an independent, open-source GUI and is not affiliated with or endorsed by Cisco.
